name: Interview Notice: Associate Professor, Vocational Education - Commerce Accountancy

details.Eligibility Criteria: The candidate must meet the eligibility criteria and produce the testimonials which he/she possesses as on last date of submission of application i.e. 27.08.2024.
details.Required Documents: Please produce the following documents/testimonials in support for your candidature: One set of self-attested photocopies of certificates in support of information filled in by you in your online application. Original degree, diplomas and other certificates of qualifications, experience certificates, matriculation/equivalent certificates in support of declaration of age, caste certificates with regard to claim for relaxations under any category as provided by the Govt. of India/NCERT and undertaking as per Annexure-III of the Advertisement.
details.Interview Process: As a part of the interview, you may present your work done in the last 3-5 years in the concerned subject area, in the form of Power Point Presentation. The Power Point Presentation should not be more than 5 minutes time and for your presentation you should bring your own Pen drive/Hard dics.

details.venue: Conference Room, First Floor, Zakir Hussain Khand, NCERT, Sri Aurobindo Marg, New Delhi-110016
details.traveling_expenses: AC train fare to-and-fro (except Rajdhani Vande Bharat, Tejas Shatabadi, Durunto trains etc. or actual fare, whichever is less) will be paid to non-local candidates on production of Railway/Bus Tickets.

details.weightage: 80% for written test and 20% for personal interview
